desc: Atlanta #1 Luxury Virgin Hair. Textures Body Wave, Silky Straight, Loose Curl, Water Wave & Deep Curl are available. Our Bundle Deals are 9A grade Hair & our single bundles are 10A grade of hair. Top tier Customer service along with FAST FAST shipping, we have you covered EVERY step of the way! Shop the Boujee Way!

layout.text: Take the frustration out of keeping your lace melted & removing your lace
